title: European Union threatens tougher vaccine export curbs, escalating feud with U.S. and Britain
content:
1. European Union threatens tougher vaccine export curbs, escalating feud with U.S. and Britain  NBC News
  2. Dominic Raab accuses EU of 'brinkmanship' over vaccine supply threat  Guardian News
  3. EU sets out virus pass plan to allow free travel by summer  Associated Press
  4. Vaccine-Export Fight Hastens Decline in EU-U.K. Relations  The Wall Street Journal
  5. Ursula von der Leyen says EU could halt vaccine exports to UK  Guardian News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:

localize.title: 欧盟扬言要更加严厉地限制疫苗出口，与美英的恩怨不断升级。
